channel.title: Saint Petersburg on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Saint Petersburg on Rusland 1

item.title: До свиданья, дорогая!
item.description: Я СМЕЛЕЙ (2019) I am braver – from their first and only album Себя потерял (2019). A world of colorful paints But I am just a shadow Don’t look for me I’m braver Don’t look for me I’m braver Don’t look for me I’m braver The crescent moon Will fall on you from the sky Shattering hearts Into a thousand pieces It will stop And make you understand You will never love again You will never love again You will never love again

item.title: дурной вкус (durnoy vkus) 3x
item.description: думаешь ты (Do You Think, 2020) Video by Alberto Mendez, who added tourist film footage to the music. From светомузыка (2020); also check the title track by Mendez. Explicit lyrics, simple chords. звук и темнота (Sound and Darkness, 2019) Also on #Winter Holidays.

item.title: Кукрыниксы – No Big Deal (Это не беда)
item.description: Горшенев From Кукрыниксы (Kukryniksy), a Saint Petersburg band now defunct, with Это не беда (1999) as their most well-known legacy (along with Чёрная невеста, Знай, and Колдовство). The new band of lead singer Алексей Горшенёв (1975, brother of Михаил) is called Горшенев.

item.title: телеэкран (Teleekran) 4x
item.description: Капитан Радар (2020) From the Реактор EP (2020). Also featuring Плохо скрытый ужас and На радарах, which also has a live version. Lyrics available on the Bandcamp track page and here. In cryogenic sleep, birthdays pass by And films lose their meaning.

item.title: ПОРТ(812) 3x + Маррадёры
item.description: 812 is the area code for Saint Petersburg, where ПОРТ(812) is based. The founding date, 8-12, is a nice coincidence. Честь, свобода и любовь (2020) Honor, freedom, and love. And нет других богов—no other gods. From the album Подарок (Gift, 2020).

item.title: Vadim Kurilev – Harakiri
item.description: First line: Я привык превращать свою музыку в шум. I am used to turning my music into noise. Second line: Прятать страшные сны под обломки хардрока. Hiding scary dreams under the wreckage of hard rock. But Где-то я уже всё это видел.

item.title: Nesoglasie – The Meaning of Life
item.description: Question and Answer Смысл means meaning, жизни (from жизнь) means of life. So, The Meaning of Life is just two words. And it’s the title of this song. It begins (after the guitar) with И я не знаю, что будет завтра Может, завтра я умру.

item.title: Чёрная Речка – Monster
item.description: Чудовище (monster) is the final track of Чужие свои (2016). Here are all my treasures for you, Though they aren’t worth a penny. I will be your monster, Hidden within the human. Tekst Interestingly, the word чудовище comes from чудо (wonder).

item.title: Animal ДжаZ – Three Stripes
item.description: Jeans and Sneakers Джинсы порезаны: jeans cut. Лето: summer. Три полоски на кедах: three stripes on sneakers. Под теплым дождем: in the warm rain. There is also a lyrics version, a performance with Amatory, and one with Alai Oli.
